items.text: length outside off, steered past backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
items.postText:
Kamani: "Its 3 am in The Caribbean.. Ad seeing players get out easily im not surprised at all. It takes good technique to play against Bangladesh in Bangladesh because they have a good record at home. No 1 teams went there and still could not win against them"

Time for drinks
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.preText:
Anik: "Did any international player ever comment here?? Just want to know " -- Not sure about here but I remember a couple of times players asking something in our Ask Steven column.

Amit Mahajan: "All coz of WICB. Imagine a WI team as below :- Chris Gayle, Shai Hope, Lendl Simmons, Nicollas Pooran , Hetmeyer , Dwayne Bravo, Carlos Braithwaite/Darren Sammy/Keiron Pollar, Sunil Narine, Kemar Roach,Thomas, K Paul "

Shakib Al Hasan comes into the attack
items.text: length ball, angling on the pads, Samuels comes forward and looks to defend, gets hit on the pads
items.postText: Tvs: "My ODI XI for WI : Lewis Charles S Hope S Hetmyar R Chase / A Russell R Powell J Holder S Naraine S Gabriel K Roach D Bishho/ S Badree I Guess this ODI squad will be decent, atleast on paper"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller around off and middle. Defended back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length on the stumps, goes back and works it towards long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: a low full on middle and leg, helped towards long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: arm ball, some bounce as well, Hope goes back and defends it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.preText: Arjun Kumar: "Feeling pity on Samuels, The Man of big games, unable to rotate strikes but the problem is not learning from his past matches, still having same techniques, no improvements at all."
items.text: short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punched through the off side, a misfield there by the extra cover fielder gifts West Indies a boundary, Mashrafe is not happy there
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: short of length, rising towards the bowler who was looking to pull it away, gets cramped with the ball hitting high on the bat, rolls towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: short of length once more, another pull, rolls his wrists over it and hits it to the right of short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punches it towards cover for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: length, on the stumps, punched towards long-on for another single
items.postText: Monirhk: "At the end of this game, Samuel is going to be hero. I bet... "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Mashur: "@Vivek: When your so called fresh bloods got the responsibility, they ended up making a possibility of making a World Cup for the first time being WI dropped. Then board decided to bring back the experienced ones to add some colour in the team. As they have been back after long time they should be given some time to be fair."
items.text: length outside off, punched towards long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Srinivas Ghatta: "I cant understand why these slow scoring guys could not replicate this in well suited format tests. there get out early and come in to ODI score slowly ." -- Different field settings, different mindset of the bowling team
items.text: length around off, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length, outside off, goes for the pull but this one keeps way to low, hits the keeper on the boot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 bye

items.text: length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, driven to the left of short midwicket, a good stop there
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: angling on middle and leg, gets to his fifty with a single behind square
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks Hemant. Familiar story for West Indies so far, with Hope looking fluent and the rest of the top order struggling. Here's Saifuddin
items.text: starts off with one straying on the pads, and is clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: edged for four short and wide outside off, and he pushed at it, but the ball takes a thick edge to fly down to the boundary. May have been half deliberate
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, pushed into the off side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off again, pushed gently towards point. Hope had taken several strides looking for a quick run, but Samuels sent him back
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, no run

items.text: pulled with authority bad first over from Saifuddin, drags this way too short. Samuels knows mid-on is up and he pulls it from outside off to the wide long-on fence
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, FOUR runs
